description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. As the Chief of the Canyon Project, rescue the civilians from zombies and help them by building a bridge across the Canyon. The Canyon Viaduct demands challenging assignments in three different modes - Normal, Expert and Killer. Can you take up this job?
description.short: As the Chief of the Canyon Project, rescue the civilians from zombies and help them by building a bridge across the Canyon. The Canyon Viaduct demands challenging assignments in three different modes - Normal, Expert and Killer. Can you take up this job?
